newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: S.Lanka T-bill oversubscribed, continue to ease.
newsitem.headline: S.Lanka T-bill oversubscribed, continue to ease.

text.p: Average yields of three, six and 12-month treasury bills yields decreased by 0.20 percentage points, 0.28 and 0.31 at Wednesday's auctions, the Central Bank said. It said the auction was heavily oversubscribed.
Bids received Bids accepted Avg yield
NOTE - Bids in million rupees, yields in percent (previous week's yields in brackets).
